name: laminas/laminas-mvc
description: Laminas's event-driven MVC layer, including MVC Applications, Controllers, and Plugins

suggest.laminas/laminas-json: (^2.6.1 || ^3.0) To auto-deserialize JSON body content in AbstractRestfulController extensions, when json_decode is unavailable
suggest.laminas/laminas-log: ^2.9.1  To provide log functionality via LogFilterManager, LogFormatterManager, and LogProcessorManager
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-console: laminas-mvc-console provides the ability to expose laminas-mvc as a console application
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-i18n: laminas-mvc-i18n provides integration with laminas-i18n, including a translation bridge and translatable route segments
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-middleware: To dispatch middleware in your laminas-mvc application
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-plugin-fileprg: To provide Post/Redirect/Get functionality around forms that container file uploads
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-plugin-flashmessenge: To provide flash messaging capabilities between requests
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-plugin-identity: To access the authenticated identity (per laminas-authentication) in controllers
suggest.laminas/laminas-mvc-plugin-prg: To provide Post/Redirect/Get functionality within controllers
suggest.laminas/laminas-paginator: ^2.7 To provide pagination functionality via PaginatorPluginManager
suggest.laminas/laminas-servicemanager-di: laminas-servicemanager-di provides utilities for integrating laminas-di and laminas-servicemanager in your laminas-mvc application
